channel.title: ssh on ansible | IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on ansible | IT Quicktasks

item.title: Replace SSH Connectivity via Paramiko
item.description: When an issue such as “Timeout, waiting for priviledged escalation” happens Run the playbook as follows: ansible-playbook -c paramiko ansible/ansible-usermgr.yml -i "cool.example.com, " -vvv suggested in https://github.com/ansible/ansible/issues/14426
